meanings.definition: A sheet of paper containing clipped articles or images.
meanings.sent1: I organized my magazine clippings on a clipsheet.
meanings.sent2: She handed me a clipsheet with all the important news articles.
meanings.sent3: The clipsheet of cat pictures made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a clipsheet of memories, neatly arranged and easily accessible.
meanings.sent5: The clipsheet of recipes was a treasure trove of culinary inspiration.

meanings.definition: To clip or fasten together with a clipsheet.
meanings.sent1: Please clipsheet these papers together before submitting them.
meanings.sent2: He clipsheeted the documents to keep them in order.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to clipsheet their notes for a more organized study session.
meanings.sent4: She clipsheeted her thoughts, ensuring nothing would slip away.
meanings.sent5: The team clipsheeted their ideas, creating a cohesive presentation.
